data.tweet: See the numbers behind Chelsea's draw with RB Salzburg ⚽️ 🧵 👇
sentences: See the numbers behind Chelsea's draw with RB Salzburg ⚽️ 🧵 👇

data.tweet: Chelsea were able to get the ball into dangerous positions, completing 12 key passes and 16 balls into the opponent's box. RB Salzburg managed one key pass and three balls into the Chelsea box.
sentences: Chelsea completed 12 key passes.
RB Salzburg completed one key pass.
Chelsea managed to play an impressive 16 successful balls into the opponent's box.
RB Salzburg played just three successful balls into the opponent's box.

data.tweet: Chelsea also played an impressive 46 passes into the final third with a long ball completion rate of 71%. RB Salzburg managed 11 balls into the final third, with 38% of their long balls hitting a target.
sentences: Chelsea completed 71% of the passes they played long.
RB Salzburg completed 38% of the passes they played long.
Chelsea played 46 successful balls into the final third.
RB Salzburg played 11 successful balls into the final third.

data.tweet: Marc Cucurella, our man of the match, made two key passes and pressed the opponent 19 times - he won possession with 11 of those presses (more than any other player on the pitch).
sentences: Marc Cucurella was our man of the match.
Marc Cucurella completed two key passes.
Jorginho completed two key passes.
Jorginho completed joint-most key passes of any player on the pitch.
Marc Cucurella completed joint-most key passes of any player on the pitch.
Marc Cucurella pressed their opponent 19 times.
Marc Cucurella pressed the opponent joint-most times than any player on the pitch.
Marc Cucurella pressed their opponent 11 times.
Marc Cucurella successfully pressed the opponent more times than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Cucurella also attempted six challenges - more than any other player on the pitch.
sentences: Marc Cucurella attempted six challenges.
Marc Cucurella attempted more challenges than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Mason Mount played five successful passes into the opponent's box - more than any other player on the pitch.
sentences: Mason Mount played five successful balls into the opponent's box.
Mason Mount played the most successful balls into the opponent's box.

data.tweet: Mason Mount has played three successful crosses in the Champions League this season, behind only Ousmane Dembele of Barcelona who's played four.
sentences: Mason Mount completed three crosses.
Mason Mount completed more crosses than any other player on the pitch.
Mason Mount has completed the second most crosses of any player in the Champions League.
Mason Mount (Chelsea) has completed three crosses in the Champions League this season.
Ousmane Dembele (Barcelona)  has completed the most crosses of any player in the Champions League.
Ousmane Dembele (Barcelona) has completed four crosses in the Champions League this season.

data.tweet: In this match, Mason Mount successfully received 13 progressive passes (more than any other player on the pitch) and dribbled past an opponent three times (joint-most alongside Reece James).
sentences: Mason Mount successfully recieved 13 progressive passes.
Mason Mount successfully recieved more progressive passes than any other player on the pitch.

Reece James dribbled past an opponent joint-most times of any player on the pitch.

Mason Mount dribbled past an opponent joint-most times of any player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Mount and Cucurella both made a match-high four successful tackles.
sentences: Mason Mount won four tackles.
Marc Cucurella won more tackles than any other player on the pitch.
